<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[The Gunworks](/Articles.aspx?ID=63)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun](/Sources.aspx?ID=125) pg. 64</row>

Decipher the machinations of the Inner Sea's greatest gunsmiths by unlocking the secrets of Alkenstar's most explosive technological hub: the Gunworks!
name: The Gunworks
